Class TimeControl

java.lang.Object
com.github.bhlangonijr.chesslib.game.TimeControl
public class TimeControl extends Object
A generic chess time control used in a game or a chess event. Depending on its type, the time control can be defined by different components. It is also possible to convert the time control to and from its PGN representation.

  • Method Details

    • parseFromString

      public static TimeControl parseFromString(String s)
      Parses a string that defines a time control and returns its representation.

      Different formats are supported, as specified in TimeControlType.

      Parameters:
      s - the string to parse
      Returns:
      the parsed time control
